issue.title: [FlightRPC] Test RPC features in integration tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5875](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5875). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should test not just wire-format compatibility, but feature-compatibility in Flight integration tests. This may mean adding a separate suite of tests to the integration script.

Features that should be tested include:
 \* Authentication
 \* Error & error code propagation
 \* Cancellation
 \* Flow control/backpressure
